SELECT t.id, t.app_name, t.app_package, t.app_version, t.app_file, t.app_md5, t.app_description, sdi1.label AS upgrade_mode FROM `t_app_version` t
WHERE t.del_flag = '0' AND t.organ_id IN (SELECT id FROM sys_office WHERE parent_ids LIKE '%,'||#{organId}||',%' '%,'+#{organId}+',%' CONCAT('%,', #{organId}, ',%') AND del_flag = '0' UNION select id from sys_office where id = #{organId} AND del_flag = '0')
AND t.app_name like '%'||#{appName}||'%' '%'+#{appName}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{appName}, '%')
AND t.app_version like '%'||#{appVersion}||'%' '%'+#{appVersion}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{appVersion}, '%')
AND t.app_package = #{appPackage}
ORDER BY t.app_version DESC

SELECT t.apk_id AS id, t.upgrade_type, sdi1.label AS upgrade_desc, v.app_name, v.app_package, v.app_version, v.app_file, v.app_md5, v.app_description, t.create_date FROM t_app_device t
WHERE device_sn = #{appDescription} AND t.del_flag = '0'
AND v.app_name like '%'||#{appName}||'%' '%'+#{appName}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{appName}, '%')
AND v.app_version like '%'||#{appVersion}||'%' '%'+#{appVersion}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{appVersion}, '%')
ORDER BY t.create_date DESC
SELECT DISTINCT(t.app_package) FROM `t_app_version` t WHERE t.id IN (SELECT apk_id FROM `t_app_device` WHERE device_sn = #{appDescription}) AND t.del_flag = '0'
SELECT id, app_name, app_package, app_version, app_file, app_md5, app_description, start_hard, end_hard, upgrade_mode FROM `t_app_version` t WHERE id = #{id} AND del_flag = '0'
